item.title: Mastering DevOps: Your Guide to Learning, Certification, and Community Engagement
item.author: Author
item.description: DevOps is not just a set of tools but a cultural shift towards automation, collaboration, and integration between software development and IT operations. Whether you’re new to DevOps or looking to expand your expertise, it’s essential to understand its key principles, tools, platforms, and methodologies. This post serves as a roadmap to help you navigate the journey of studying, learning, and becoming certified in DevOps.

item.title: Azure Pipelines Container Agents for Azure Devops
item.author: Author
item.description: Create self-hosted Azure Pipelines Container Agents for Azure Devops.
